mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.discontent AS "discontent", a.level AS "level", a.type AS "type", a.contype AS "contype", a.hots AS "hots", a.content AS "content", a.bg AS "bg", a.envriment AS "envriment", a.ziliao AS "ziliao", a.shrq AS "shrq", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", u.name AS "createBy.name"
JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = a.create_by
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_course( name, discontent, level, type, contype, hots, content, bg, envriment, ziliao, shrq, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{discontent}, #{level}, #{type}, #{contype}, #{hots}, #{content}, #{bg}, #{envriment}, #{ziliao}, #{shrq}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_course SET name = #{name}, discontent = #{discontent}, level = #{level}, type = #{type}, contype = #{contype}, hots = #{hots}, content = #{content}, bg = #{bg}, envriment = #{envriment}, ziliao = #{ziliao}, shrq = #{shrq}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
